name: Freeport Village Premier Inn
description:
The Freeport Village Premier Inn is a great place to stay if you are looking for a hotel close to the wedding venue.
The hotel is located in the Freeport Village shopping outlet, which is a short drive from the reception venue.
The hotel has a restaurant and bar on site and is a great place to stay if you are looking for a comfortable place to stay.

name: Travel Lodge Braintree
description:
The Travel Lodge Braintree is located in the heart of Braintree and equidistant between the church and reception.
The hotel has on-site paid parking but is also a 5 minute walk from the local train station. Guests can also opt for a cooked breakfast.

name: The White Hart Hotel
description:
The White Hart Hotel is a 16th century coaching inn located in the heart of Braintree.
The hotel is a short journey from both the church and reception and is connected to a green king pub and restaurant.
The hotel has free parking and is a great place to stay if you are looking for a traditional English hotel.
